articles.description: Apple has acknowledged an excessive battery drain issue in multiple Watch models and promised that a fix will arrive in an upcoming update.
articles.content: Last week, a number of Apple Watch owners noticed that their batteries were draining much quicker than normal after they installed the latest watchOS version 10.1. Now, Apple has acknowledged the iss… [+1162 chars]

articles.content: Samsung has partnered with Disney and Pixar to release two Toy Story-inspired case designs for its first Fan Edition wireless earbuds, the Galaxy Buds FE. The Lotso and Hamm cases for the Galaxy Buds… [+1855 chars]

articles.title: Google Warns How Hackers Could Abuse Calendar Service as a Covert C2 Channel - The Hacker News
articles.description: Google warns of hackers exploiting its Calendar service to host command-and-control (C2) infrastructure.
articles.content:
Google is warning of multiple threat actors sharing a public proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit that leverages its Calendar service to host command-and-control (C2) infrastructure.
